visual.name: WritebackGrid
visual.description: Unlocks advanced data editing and seamless writeback by using an intuitive grid visual.

pbiRefresh.description: Enable automatic Power BI dataset refresh after committing changes, which is especially useful for Import connection mode.

pbiRefreshDatasetType.description: The Power BI dataset type you want to refresh.

pbiRefreshDatasetId.description: The Power BI dataset id you want to refresh.

pbiRefreshDatasetWorkspaceId.description: The Power BI workspace id where the dataset you want to refresh resides.

pbiRefreshDatasetTable.description: The Power BI dataset table you want to refresh.

pbiRefreshDatasetTablePartition.description: The Power BI dataset table partition you want to refresh.

pbiRefresServicePrincipalTenantId.description: The tenant id of the service principal.

pbiRefresServicePrincipalId.description: The client id of the service principal.

pbiRefresServicePrincipalKey.description: The (secret) key of the service principal.

pbiRefreshUser.description: The entra id user name executing the refresh with full access and having MFA disabled.

pbiRefreshPassword.description: The entra id user password executing the refresh

pbiRefreshServicePrincipalId.description: The entra id user name executing the refresh with full access and having MFA disabled.

selfHostingBaseUrl.description: The endpoint of the premium writeback service.

selfHosting.description: Enable premium option for the writeback service.

voucher.description: Unlocking all features by providng a voucher code.

databaseServer.description: The name or url and port of the database server.

databaseUser.description: The name of the database user that will execute the writeback commands and queries.

databasePassword.description: The password of the database user.

databaseTable.description: The name of the database table including schema if required, e.g. dbo.table

databaseTableAudit.description: Auditing changes with user name and timestamp.

databaseTableAuditUser.description: The Power BI DAX measure selected via the function symbol. e.g. CurrentUsername = USERPRINCIPALNAME()

databaseTableAuditUserColumn.description: The database column name where the user name is stored.

databaseTableAuditTimestamp.description: The Power BI DAX measure selected via the function symbol. e.g. CurrentTimestamp = FORMAT(NOW(), "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss"

databaseTableAuditTimestampColumn.description: The database column name where the timestsamp is stored.

databricksHost.description: The Databricks instance host name, e.g. '********.databricks.com'

databricksHTTPPath.description: The Databricks compute resources URL either to a Databricks SQL endpoint (e.g. /sql/1.0/endpoints/1234567890abcdef), or to a Databricks Runtime interactive cluster (e.g. /sql/protocolv1/o/1234567890123456/1234-123456-slid123)

databricksCatalog.description: The name of the catalog, default is hive_metastore.

databricksDatabaseTable.description: The name of the database table in Delta format.

databricksDatabaseTableUID.description: A comma-separated list of fields that uniquely identifies each row in the table. (e.g. Column 1, Column 2)

databricksPAT.description: The Databricks Personal Access Token for the account that will execute the writeback commands and queries.

dataverseAPI.description: The service root URL to the instance Web API, e.g. https://yourorg.api.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.2/

dataverseEntity.description: The logical name (case-sensitive) of the table/entity you want to edit data.

azureTenantID.description: The tenant id from the registered Azure app (service principal) with the required permissions.

azureClientID.description: The client id from the registered Azure app (service principal) with the required permissions.

azureClientSecret.description: The client secret from the registered Azure app (service principal) with the required permissions.

pushdown.description: The method of allocating the newly entered value among the group's child rows.

baseUrl.description: The basis url of the web service.

apiKey.description: The license key of the web service.

horizontalScrollbarShow.description: Show/hide the horizontal scrollbar even when there is not enough data to need scrolling.

verticalScrollbarShow.description: Show/hide the vertical scrollbar even when there is not enough data to need scrolling.

enableAddRow.description: Allowing to add a new row to the grid.

enableRemoveRow.description: Allowing to remove an existing row from the grid.

enableEditRow.description: Allowing to edit an existing row from the grid.

rowHeight.description: The row heights of the table.

headerHeight.description: The header height of the table.

rowBorderColorThickness.description: Thickness of the horizontal grid lines in pixels

columnBorderColorThickness.description: Thickness of the vertical grid lines in pixels

backgroundHeader.description: The fill color of the table header.

background.description: The fill color of the table rows.

backgroundOdd.description: The alternate fill color of the table rows.

backgroundSelected.description: The fill color of the selected table rows.

backgroundHover.description: The fill color of when hovering over table rows.

fontSize.description: The font size of the table.

checkboxColorFill.description: The fill color of the checkbox.

checkboxColor.description: The color of the checkbox when activated.

checkboxColorUnchecked.description: The color of the checkbox when deactivated.

changeColor.description: The fill color of the highlighted changes.

changeTime.description: The milliseconds a change beeing highlighted.

messageTime.description: The milliseconds a message beeing shown.

buttonColor.description: The fill color of the menu.

buttonFontColor.description: The fill color of the buttons.

enumeration.value: "Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

wrapText.description: Activate wrap text on the grid.

paginationsetAuto.description: Activate auto pagination on the grid.

ignore.description: Enable to ignore a (virtual) column during writeback if not part of the underlying table.

hide.description: Enable to hide column in grid.

freeze.description: Enable to freeze column in grid.

typeCheck.description: Enable to check data type on user input.

filter.description: Enable to show built-in filter icon in grid.

hyperlink.description: Enable to turn value into click-able hyperlink hy bolding CTRL key.

hyperlinkOptions.description: The way the hyperlink is display to the user.

dropdownValuesMapping.description: Is this a dropdown column, and what are the dropdown values?

customDropdownValues.description: Custom values delimited by vertical lines (e.g. value1|value2)

customFormat.description: The custom format of the column.

rowCount.description: Show Reduction for all row groups
